skill.name: Saint's Conviction
skill.value: Deals 2116/2596 DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets take 45/55% more DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Priest (Lv. 36)
ability.value: Slightly increases the ATK speed of all allies.

ability.name: God's Favor (Lv. 68)
ability.value: Slightly reduces DMG received for all melee allies.
